name: PixelBullets
description:
PixelBullets is a retro-style arcade space shooter with some light RPG elements. It is in development by myself for a few weeks now. It will be available for Windows, Linux and Android.

While it's being developed, it will be publicly available for free (though donations are very much appreciated, thank you!).

Input:

  • W,A,S,D & Mouse (alternatively the arrow keys, Z and X.)
  • Gamepad
  • Touch (on Android, Windows tablets like the Surface)

Planned Features:

  • Ship rotation - not sure how it will work, because it needs to be compatible and intuitive for touch screens.
  • More upgrades
  • Ship repair mechanic
  • Fuel mechanic
  • Storyline
  • Improved, more responsive UI

PixelBullets is a one-man project, all programming, artwork, music is made by myself, you can check out my soundcloud.
